amendment.description: To protect United States workers from competition of foreign workforces for performance of Federal and State contracts.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2660 as modified agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 70 - 26. Record Vote Number: 32.

action.text: Amendment SA 2660 proposed by Senator Dodd. (consideration: CR S2088; text: CR S2088) To protect United States workers from competition of foreign workforces for performance of Federal and State contracts.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2660 as modified agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 70 - 26. Record Vote Number: 32.
